title: Announcements have arrived
body: We decided that we needed a way to communicate directly to our users so we made the announcements page. Check back here for new features and other important messages.

title: iBGG 2.1 in Development!
body: We're proud to announce that we're working on some really great features for iBGG. We've had a lot of requests for the ability to login and manage your plays on BGG so that is something we're trying to work through. Until then, we're hoping to release features including; iOS app equivalent listings for your favorite board game as well as additional functionality to the game details pages. We're excited to release so keep your eyes open.
